response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. I understand its significance and appreciate the importance it would bring into your life. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this unique item at a price of $1,200,000. This figure represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic worth to me and its perceived value to you, aiming to ensure a fair transaction for both parties. I am confident that this proposal will facilitate a mutually beneficial outcome. Should you require any additional information or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to contact me. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
